alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 12 at 7:59PM PDT until June 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... For the wind advisory, winds have diminished over much of the area to below advisory thresholds. There are a few windier locales that are still blowing to 45 mph, but for the majority of the area, the winds have diminished. Therefore, the advisory is being allowed to expire at 8PM. * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...White Pine County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From midnight Monday night to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
